Anderson.Anderson Municipal Airport:
Anderson Municipal Airport (IATA: AID, ICAO: KAID, FAA LID: AID) (Darlington Field) is three miles east of Anderson, in Madison County, Indiana. The National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011–2015 categorized it as a general aviation facility.


== Facilities ==
The airport covers 619 acres (251 ha) at an elevation of 919 feet (280 m).
